item.title: Stock market rally on hot CPI print is indicative of market strength, declares strategist Tom Lee
item.description: Tom Lee says it’s a sign of how robust the stock market is right now that gains came on a hotter-than-forecast core CPI report.

item.title: A recent college grad asks: How do I compete with AI to get a job in finance?

item.title: ‘I’m tired of corporate America’: My wife and I have $1.65 million. I’m 61. Can I retire already?
I’m a senior who barely survives on $1,300 a month. No way could I live on $1,000.
item.description: “We seniors are pressured and scammed into buying a lot of things we don’t need.”
